name: Scottish Environment Protection Agency Hydrometric Data
description: Provision of Hydrometric Open Data to professional users via API

SDGs.evidenceText: Provision of this information allows communities to build sustainably avoiding inappropriate development on floodplain (via flood risk assessment and land use planning processes) and via flood defence solutions
Historical hydrometric data allows us to quantify the changes in our weather and hydrological cycle in response to climate change, and estimate future changes
